task.title: Deleting Items from a Collection
task.shortdesc: You can delete an item from a collection should you decide you no longer need the item.

context.p: Deleting an item from a collection removes the item from your Zotero library entirely. This may be useful for users needing to make space in their libraries.

step.cmd: Select the item(s) in the collection
Right-click on the item(s), and select “Move Item(s) to Trash”
step.info: When “My Library” or a Group library name is selected in the left Zotero pane, pressing the Delete key will also move items to the trash. When a collection or subcollection is selected, press Cmd/Ctrl-Delete to move the items directly to the trash.
